casename: Lum Chang Building Contractors Pte Ltd v Anderson Land Pte Ltd
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; L P Thean JA
counsel: Woo Bih Li SC (instructed), John Chung and Sharon Tay (Donaldson & Burkinshaw) for the appellants; Alvin Yeo SC, Paul Sandosham and Kirindeep Singh (Wong Partnership) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Agreement/Arbitration ordered by court/Nature of arbitration award pursuant to such arbitration/Whether necessary for court to adopt such an award/s 22 Arbitration Act (Cap 10, 1985 Rev Ed)

Arbitration/Award/Setting aside/Time within which to apply to set aside award/Extension of time/Whether mistake of law or otherwise of solicitor constitutes sufficient grounds for extension of time/ss 23(2), 28 Arbitration Act (Cap 10, 1985 Rev Ed)/O 69 r 4 Rules of Court
Words and Phrases/"Equivalent to judgment of a judge"/s 23(2)Arbitration Act (Cap 10, 1985 Rev Ed)
